Diversas dificuldades para cada tipo de jogador , desde o Easy ao Hell on Earth.

Contras:

Pelo fato de KF2 existir , KF1 est√° praticamente "morrendo", restando poucos servers com ping aceit√°vel e servers com "MODS" (que na minha opini√£o √© bem pat√©tico voc√™ usar mods por n√£o conseguir ganhar em certa dificuldade )
Alguns bugs antigos que ainda existem n√£o foram corrigidos , alguns de conquistas e por ai vai.

Bem infelizmente √© isto , o jogo est√° morrendo assim como todo jogo multiplayer um dia vai.

killing floor was once a short trashy/buggy singleplayer survival horror game but it was very enjoyeble after few hundreds of updates it was going to be a wave based multiplayer survival horror game :3 the graphic isnt that good compared to other games at this time but its a huge amount of fun killing ugly mutants wave for wave till you reach the endboss (patriarch) sure it still have few bugs and the community is damn worse but its still an amazing game~ <3 also it have tons of mods and dlcs.. the only bad thing at that is the girl characters looks ugly :c also that game might be a bit hard for the beginning but when you learn fast or have much endurance you can spend hundreds of hours in this game and still have fun :3

[h1] Killing floor is one of the best zombie killing games i have ever played[/h1]

[u]A few reasons why the killing floor games are so amazing can be for example...[/u]

[olist]
   [1] The different perk choices allowing you to choose a preferred playstyle or just for variation. each and every perk having its advantages and disadvantages
   [2] The graphics and sound effects and skins etc.
   [3] The ability to modify these games for a bunch of different gameplays like custom story, custom maps, weapons, perks and possibly even custom characters etc.
   [4] Also the fact that some zeds and the game itself even has some backstory just makes the game experience deeper and can even let you understand the game better

[i]The sad thing about killing floor 1 is that not a lot of players buy it anymore considering it's a bit old,

but nonetheless it's still a very fun and awesome game to play together with your friends or others[/i]

[b]I still recommend both Killing Floor 1 and 2 to players who might like some action and awesomeness...[/b]

Great art design and humor mixed in with the horror.  Balanced classes that make you want to use each of them.  Smooth gameplay mechanics.  Awesome soundtrack.  Great blend of enemies.  Good cooperative gameplay.  Players are usually very friendly and quick to give money or guns if your late joining a match.  Mininmal lag issues and ping is usually great.  In short what isn't there to like about this game?  If you get bored of just killing Zeds there is always Objective mode, not to mention several mods like Toy Master and Defense Alliance 2 and a slew of player created mods, levels, etc.  I definitely recommend this game.  And any game that has an ode to Red Dwarf is always golden in my book ya smegheads.
It's too casual. Pretty dull after playing 100 hours.

So just realising, I have actually never written out a Review for this game.
Killing floor 1, There is plenty of great things about it. Not may plagues upon it, Or any i can remeber upon writing this.

Pros:
+Risk reward gameplay. Now this game expands on if you Risk your life to kill stuff, There is a chance for an amazing reward.

+Classes Balanced to suit one another. They all have a great balance to support eachother in any range.

+Weapons. They feel strong, No underwealming weapons.

+Graphics. So for the time it has been released, It has had really good graphics. These days, its kinda not as good, but Hey, Its a older game.

+Map design, For a Suvival game, The map design is amazing. They suit all classes. Long range and CCQ. its all there

Cons:
-game seems a little easy when you get the hang of it.

-Can become repetitive, AI follow the same line most of the time

This game overall, Has been amazing. 

9/10

[h1]Very fun if played co-op, 88/100[/h1]

[b]Pro:[/b]

[olist]
[*]Large number of weapons
[*]Classes have specific strength against specific mobs.
[*]Many maps with a distinctive playstyle.
[*]Very good mod support.
[/olist]

[b]Con:[/b]

[olist]
[*]Not much to do after reaching max level.
[/olist]
